english: footprint pointing down; to walk slowly

etymology.interpretation: 夊 (suī) depicts a footprint pointing down, suggesting a slow walking motion. It is a variant of 夂 (zhǐ) with a similar concept, emphasizing the directionality of movement.

examples.chinese: 夊是很少用的汉字(夊是很少用的漢字)
examples.pinyin: suī shì hěn shǎo yòng de Hànzì
examples.english: 夊 is a rarely used Chinese character.

examples.chinese: 在古代，夊表示缓慢行走(在古代，夊表示緩慢行走)
examples.pinyin: zài gǔdài, suī biǎoshì huǎnmàn xíngzǒu
examples.english: In ancient times, 夊 represented walking slowly.
